overview: The story begins with Dr. Wiseman, a 50 year old British dentist landing himself a role in one of his patients film who happens to be a film producer. The doctor had a real passion and was obsessed with the mere idea of being on the stage thus thinks of this as an opportunity to reignite and live his long lost dream. On realizing that it's just a small walk on role, he goes through the journey from disappointment towards the realization that no role, no dialogue is too small for a real actor and performs the role wholeheartedly, walking away with a sense of complete satisfaction.
title: A Scene with Dialogue?
